main: ^Your eyes flutter closed, and just as you're about to drift into sleep, you hear a creak and a grumble.
^You open your eyes and a demon is laying on top of you, crushing your chest and stifling your breath.

c-0: ^DEMON: Oh, my! So sorry to startle you like this.
c-1: ^DEMON: Oh dear. I fear I may have frightened you, but please don't worry.
g-0: ^DEMON: Well, I would have thought my, admittedly unnerving, appearance would have given it away.
^DEMON: But, what I am really isn't terribly important. We are, afterall, in your dream aren't we?

c-2: ^DEMON: Why yes! I'll prove it to you. Look at the clock.
^You do as instructed. The numbers are an illegible jumble.
c-3: ^DEMON: That's a bit harsh, but I can see why you would label me like that. So if it's easier to think of me that way then, yes. I suppose I am.

g-1: ^DEMON: Now, before we get too off-track I have...something of a proposition for you.
^DEMON: Since I am your subconcious, what do you say we go on a little bit of an adventure. You've always wanted to be a hero, yes?

c-5: ^DEMON: Well, I think you do. I think since you're dreaming about me telling you that you want to be a hero means you want to be a hero. Right?

g-2: ^DEMON: Great! Then this will be super easy. How about we go kill some monsters? I mean there's no harm in killing a bunch of monsters in a dream right?
^DEMON: Superb! Ready to chop, slice, shoot, punch, and brutalize countless evil monsters?
